title: User Notification Preferences Management
description: As a user, I want to customize my notification preferences so that I receive relevant updates through my preferred channels without being overwhelmed by unnecessary alerts.

acceptanceCriteria.description: User can access notification settings from account menu
User can toggle email notifications on/off for each category
User can set notification frequency (immediate, daily digest, weekly)
User can choose notification channels (email, SMS, push, in-app)
Changes are saved automatically and confirmed with success message

tasks.description: Implement backend notification preference API endpoints

childStories.title: Email Notification Templates
childStories.description: As a user, I want to receive well-formatted email notifications so that I can quickly understand and act on important updates.

childStories.title: Push Notification Integration
childStories.description: As a mobile user, I want to receive push notifications so that I stay informed even when not actively using the app.

investAnalysis.feedback: Story meets all INVEST criteria with clear value proposition and testable acceptance criteria.
